channel	forward	backward

nN(1440)⁺$\leftrightarrow$np	1.20652173913	1.32608695652
pN(1440)⁰$\leftrightarrow$np	1.13043478261	1.38043478261
pN(1440)⁺$\leftrightarrow$pp	0.717391304348	0.630434782609
N(1440)⁰$\leftrightarrow$π⁻p	0.985448302302	1.00691747371
2$\times$(N(1440)⁰$\leftrightarrow$π⁰n)	0.995849515777	1.02545296951
N(1440)⁰$\leftrightarrow$nσ	1.05960759888	0.961943319838
